FLAVOUR_0_CLUBNAME.message: 星际飞行员燃料合作社

FLAVOUR_0_MEMBER_INTRO.message: You may purchase fuel and dispose of {radioactives} here.

FLAVOUR_0_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} 是一个独立的组织,致力于向其成员提供价格便宜的星际飞船的燃料.分支机构遍布整个银河系.会员的好处包括:

FLAVOUR_1_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the Federation faction

FLAVOUR_1_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} is the leading provider of discounted fuel to its members' starships in the Solar Federation. A membership will entitle you for the following:

FLAVOUR_2_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the CIW (Commonwealth of Independent Worlds) faction

FLAVOUR_2_NONMEMBER_INTRO.description: Commonwealth of Independent Worlds is the name of the CIW faction
FLAVOUR_2_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Throughout the vast reach of the free Commonwealth of Independent Worlds you will find {clubname} as the best provider of discounted fuel and waste management services. For our members, we do:

FLAVOUR_2_WELCOME.message: Greetings and salutations! We hope you enjoy our services.

FLAVOUR_3_CLUBNAME.description: Fuel club for the Haber faction

FLAVOUR_3_MEMBER_INTRO.description: For the greedy Haber faction, very corporate formulated
FLAVOUR_3_MEMBER_INTRO.message: Greetings pilot. Your refueling and conditional side-product disposal privileges are granted.

FLAVOUR_3_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: Greetings pilot. This is the Haber Propellant and Perishables Division, entrusted with managing the fuel distribution throughout Haber owned space.

LIST_BENEFITS_DISPOSAL.message: {radioactives}, 免费处理 (某些条件下适用)

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_INTRO.message: 我们有自己的燃料库存, 跟市面上的库存是独立的.

LIST_BENEFITS_JOIN.message: 现在就加入吧! 年度会员费只要 {membership_fee}

WE_WILL_ONLY_DISPOSE_OF.message: 如果您在我们这儿购买 {military_fuel}, 我们就可以免费帮您处理一些 {radioactives}.

WHAT_CONDITIONS_APPLY.message: 处置 {radioactives} 需要什么条件?

YOUR_MEMBERSHIP_APPLICATION_HAS_BEEN_DEC.message: 您的会员申请已被拒绝.

YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER.message: 您已经成为了我们的会员. 您的会员资格将在 {expiry_date} 到期.

YOU_MUST_BUY.message: 在我们处理 {radioactives}前, 你必须先购买我们的 {military_fuel} .
